original_title: Wild About Safety: Timon and Pumbaa Safety Smart Healthy & Fit!
overview: Timon and Pumbaa show students how to be healthy and fit with their germ-free philosophy. From the importance of hand-washing to making healthy food choices, Timon and Pumbaa's Safety SmartÂ® Checklist is brimming with valuable kid-friendly lessons on how to prevent the spread of germs and maintain overall well-being. Now, that's Safety Smart!
title: Wild About Safety: Timon and Pumbaa Safety Smart Healthy & Fit!
